name: Teleorb
description:
A 2D platformer based on using an enderpearl-like object to get yourself out of a cave. It has a built in speedrun timer so you can race your friends (my best time is 1:42.52). Also the game is kinda ok I think.

Controls:

  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move right
  • Space or W - Jump
  • Shift or S - Stick to wall
  • Left click - throw orb

Game Length: 30 min

Github (game is open source): https://github.com/FireSquid6/teleorb
